page.title: 02 Axmouth Village
page.content: In{Axmouth}there are very few amenities. There is a village Post Office store, the shop sells mainly household things. Sometimes it can be a bit of a problem if a person wants to go to Seaton, as in Axmouth they don't sell any clothes, shoes etc. But transport is a problem. There is only one Axe Valley mini travel service so if a person missed that bus they would have to walk unless they got a lift . The people of Axmouth rely on holiday traffic to improve their trade as there are two Pubs and Restaurants in Axmouth.
